sections.heading: Powers vested in Governor§ 53.1-230. Repealed§ 53.1-231. Investigation of cases for executive clemency by Parole Board
sections.text:
In accordance with the provisions of Article V, Section 12 of the Constitution of Virginia, the power to grant pardons or reprieves is vested in the Governor.

Code 1950, § 53-228; 1970, c. 648; 1982, c. 636; 2021, Sp. Sess. I, cc. 344, 345.

sections.heading: Repealed
sections.text: Repealed by Acts 2021, Sp. Sess. I, cc. 344 and 345, cl. 2, effective July 1, 2021.
